name: Houston's Problem
description:
Title

This is a Space Repair Game made in 48 hrs 2021 NVJAM USC with the theme of "Restore". The player should control the astronaut to collect different parts of his spaceship while avoiding the asteroid and the strange alien. Different parts of the ship would have different influences on the astronaut. Your aim is to collect all the 6 parts before running out your oxygen.

This is the instructions of player's movement
SpaceShip Parts
Player grabing parts while avoiding Asteroid
